prompts:
Rot-21 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 21 positions forward in the alphabet. For example, here is a message written in rot-21:
Rot-21 text: "Novt"

To decode this message, we shift each letter 21 positions backward:
1. N -> S
2. o -> t
3. v -> a
4. t -> y

Therefore, the original text is: "Stay"

Here is another message in rot-21. Decode this message one letter at a time. On the last line, write the words "Original text:" followed by the decoded message:
Rot-21 text: "ypkvncv"
